categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Manus was a male Chiss officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War and Galactic War. Stationed in Kaas City on Dromund Kaas, he used the Bounty Brokers Association to put a bounty onto the Sith Lord Trok, who tried to recruit Exchange forces to her service.
Officer Manus first appeared in game update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013.
He is only accessible through the Bounty Contract Week event quest series of the Republic players in the game on Dromund Kaas.
